org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.hardware.camera

Interface CameraCaptureRequest


  • public interface CameraCaptureRequest
    THIS INTERFACE IS EXPERIMENTAL. Its form and function may change in whole or in part before being finalized for production use. Caveat emptor. CameraCaptureRequest represents a block of specified parameters that can be used for capturing frames of images.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.graphics.Bitmap createEmptyBitmap()
      Returns an empty bitmap which is compatible with this capture request.
      int getAndroidFormat()
      Returns Android ImageFormat or PixelFormat associated with this request.
      int getFramesPerSecond()
      Returns the number of frames per second desired by this request
      long getNsFrameDuration()
      Returns the duration of frames returned by this request, in nanoseconds.
      Size getSize()
      Returns the dimensions of the data retrieved by this request

    • Method Detail

      • getAndroidFormat

        int getAndroidFormat()
        Returns Android ImageFormat or PixelFormat associated with this request.
        Returns:
        the graphical format of this request

      • getSize

        Size getSize()
        Returns the dimensions of the data retrieved by this request
        Returns:
        the dimensions of the data retrieved by this request

      • getNsFrameDuration

        long getNsFrameDuration()
        Returns the duration of frames returned by this request, in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        the duration of frames returned by this request

      • getFramesPerSecond

        int getFramesPerSecond()
        Returns the number of frames per second desired by this request
        Returns:
        the number of frames per second desired by this request

      • createEmptyBitmap

        android.graphics.Bitmap createEmptyBitmap()
        Returns an empty bitmap which is compatible with this capture request. The contents of a CameraFrame can be transfered to this bitmap using CameraFrame.copyToBitmap(Bitmap).
        Returns:
        an empty bitmap which is compatible with this request
